faqs.a: Rates vary by season—please visit https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book for your dates to see current rates; you can also send an inquiry from that page.

faqs.q: What taxes apply and at what percentage?
faqs.a: Total tax is 13%: 7% sales tax (Florida 6% + Okaloosa County 1%) + 6% Tourist Development Tax.

faqs.q: Is travel insurance available or recommended? Through whom?
faqs.a: Yes—travel insurance is offered during checkout from Play Travel Protection; we encourage all guests to consider it.

faqs.q: Do you require a damage deposit or hold? How much and when is it released?
faqs.a: Yes—a $300 damage hold is released 48 hours after checkout.

faqs.q: What payment methods do you accept
faqs.a: All payments are by credit card, which we believe is secure for both parties.

faqs.q: Can I modify or extend a reservation after booking?
faqs.a: We’re happy to help as long as the calendar shows availability for your new dates.
Yes—weekly and monthly discounts may apply depending on season; feel free to send an inquiry at https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book.

faqs.q: Are there any blackout dates or minimum night requirements?
faqs.a: We have a 3-night minimum; for exceptions or questions, please send an inquiry at https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book.
Our condos are right by the beach with no roads to cross—direct access via the boardwalk.
Unrestricted gulf and beach views from our condos.
We provide 2 beach chairs and 1 umbrella as a complimentary amenity; per HOA rules they must be placed behind Rapid Beach Rentals’ front rows.
Yes—especially in high season please reserve in advance: https://ldvbeach.com/destin/pelican-beach-resort/beach-chairs-umbrellas/beach-set (LDV); owner tip: ask for front row seats.
Complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi is provided in our units.
Maximum occupancy is 6 per fire code; bedding: 1 king bed, 2 hallway bunks (twin), and 1 queen sleeper sofa.
Complimentary parking is available; details are in your arrival information.
See our blog for local tips: https://www.destincondogetaways.com/blog—if you need anything specific, just ask.
Check-in is 4:00 PM; check-out is 10:00 AM.
You’re welcome to enter the resort, register at the front desk, get your parking pass and pool bracelets, and enjoy the beach and pools until the condo is ready.
Smoking and vaping are strictly prohibited inside units—use designated outdoor areas only per HOA rules.
One indoor pool with outdoor access, two outdoor pools, a kiddie pool, and two hot tubs are available for your use.
Please send an inquiry—we need to confirm with our HOA.

faqs.q: Do you have EV charging on-site?
faqs.a: Yes—EV charging is available on-site.

faqs.q: What’s the minimum age to book?
faqs.a: The primary renter must be 25 years old (or married).
Yes—there are 5 elevators in the building.

faqs.q: Do you provide beach towels, or do we bring our own?
faqs.a: Bath towels and linens are provided for use inside the condo; please bring your own beach towels.
We have two units (7th and 10th floors); each is a 1BR with hallway bunks + sleeper sofa—see visuals at https://www.destincondogetaways.com/virtualtour.
1 king bed, 2 hallway bunks (twin), and 1 queen sleeper sofa in the living room.
Fully equipped kitchen with pots, pans, utensils, dinnerware, and basic tools—bring preferred spices/oils; see https://www.destincondogetaways.com/virtualtour.
Standard drip coffee maker; starter filters provided—please bring your preferred coffee.
We provide a small starter kit (toilet paper, paper towels, soap, shampoo, dishwasher tabs); please replenish as needed.
No in-unit laundry; coin/card-operated laundry is available on each floor.
Hair dryer and iron with ironing board are provided.
Keep doors/windows closed; 72–75°F works best in humid months—systems can freeze if set too low.
Do not hang items over railings; supervise children and keep furniture away from the edge.
Grills are not allowed on balconies per HOA—please use designated community grilling areas.
Wristbands are required for pools and amenities (especially in high seasons); pick them up at the front desk during check-in.
Pools are generally open dawn to dusk; the indoor pool is heated—outdoor heat availability varies by season.
On-site fitness center available; bring wristbands—hours and age limits per HOA.
Carts are near the lobby—please return after use; elevators are busiest at check-in and check-out times.
The front desk may not accept personal packages—use an Amazon Locker or ship to a nearby pickup point.
Smart TVs support streaming apps; use your own logins and remember to sign out at checkout.
Multiple grocery options are nearby; many guests use delivery services to the lobby/entrance.
Use the front entrance/roundabout for pickup and drop-off.
We follow local orders and HOA guidance—travel insurance is recommended for weather-related disruptions.
Mid-stay cleanings can be arranged for a fee—ask for availability and pricing.

faqs.q: How do we access the condo?
faqs.a: We use a keyless smart lock; your unique access code is shared 7 days before arrival after your booking is completed.
Your code activates at 4:00 PM on check-in day and deactivates at 10:00 AM on checkout day.

faqs.q: Where will I receive the code?
faqs.a: We email your access code and arrival instructions one week before arrival; please check your spam folder.

faqs.q: I booked within a week—when do I get the code?
faqs.a: For bookings within 7 days, we send the code right after your reservation is confirmed.

faqs.q: What if I arrive late at night?
faqs.a: Late arrivals are fine—your access code works any time after 4:00 PM on your check-in day.
Codes only activate after 4:00 PM by default; request early check-in and we’ll enable earlier access if available.

faqs.q: I lost or forgot my code—what should I do?
faqs.a: Reply to your arrival email (or contact us) and we’ll promptly reissue or reset your access code.

faqs.q: Can I share the code with my family or group?
faqs.a: Sharing within your booked party is fine; please do not post or share publicly.

faqs.q: Do I need a physical key or keycard?
faqs.a: No physical keys are needed for the unit—use your access code; amenities use wristbands from the front desk.

faqs.q: Is the code unique and changed between guests?
faqs.a: Yes—each stay receives a unique code and codes are changed between reservations.
